1   
 
AHMED BIN TARIQ  
Address : House No 75 Block  B Tajpura scheme Mughal Pura, Lahore  
Cell: +92320 -4103609 | Email ID : abtariq110@gmail.com  
Date of Birth : 29/08/1993  
LinkedIn Profile : https://www.linkedin.com/in/ahmed -bin-tariq -26273816a  
 
 
EDUCATION & QUALIFICATIONS

Lahore Garrison University

Punjab Group of Colleges  
4. Matriculation  (Sciences)  Sep 2010  
Saint Anthony’s High School  
 
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  
 
BMW – Dewan Motors Pvt Ltd                                                                                                                                          May 2022 - Continue  
Assistant Manager Customer Relations,  
• Managing  a portfolio  of over  250+  Premium customers (including group CEO and Di rectors) . 
• Prospecting  and building  new business  from  existing  & new lead. 
• Sold Three new Cars  within 2 months’ worth  11Crore  (2 Electric and 1 Engine based) with out any  help or prospects.  
• Added 3 million of business by up selling and selling BMW Lifestyle items . 
• Firm grip on customer insights  and aftermarket  dealings. 
• Proper know how  on parts availability  whether they are local suppliers or it is from BMW  Germany . 
• Prope rly report regarding th e estimate follow -ups 
 
Kasmy Packages  Pvt Ltd                                                                                                                                                 Feb 2022 – May 2022  
Assistant Manager Sales, Industrial Marketing & Sales (BUFP)  
• Managing  a portfolio  of over  10 million  per annum  revenue.  
• Prospecting  and building  new business  from  existing  & new accounts  
• Added  15 million  worth  of new revenue  to my portfolio for this fiscal year.  
 
Packages  Limited                                                                                                                                                           Nov 2019 – March 2021  
Assistant Manager Sales, Industrial Marketing & Sales (BUFP)  
• Managing  a portfoli o of over  300 million  per annum  revenue.  
• Prospecting  and building  new business  from  existing  & new accounts  
• Added  approx.  30 million  worth  of new revenue  to my portfolio.  
 
Mind Bridge  Pvt Ltd                                                                                                                                         March2019 – Aug 2019  
Email Support Executive for Uber London.  
• Relationship development with Uber and the  customer.  
• Aftersales  Services.  
• Refund Strategy development for customers and which helps them to increase  sales.  
 
 
 
2   
 
KUKS  Pvt Ltd                                                                                                                                                         Aug 2018 – Feb 2019                                      
Asst. Manager Sales and Marketing  
• Relationship development with customer and  restaurant.  
• On boarding well known restaurant and negotiating share  percentage.  
• After sales  Services . 
• Organizing food mob as a brand  activity.  
• Also organized phone branding software area to  area.  
 
DeSOM                                                                                                                                                                   Feb 2015 - July 2018  
Supply chain and marketing Dept  
• Designing and implementing new strategies  for social media  campaigns.  
• Allocating and designating budgets for monthly supplies and  campaigns.  
• Started from low end as a Restaurant  manager  
• Learned what is customer service and its  importance.  
 
 
 
PROJECTS  
 
Marketing Strategy: Presented on the topic “Ho w to be a great lead in customer service and effecting it with your 
behavior”.  
Advanced Operations Management: Analyzed supply chain system of Packages limited w.r.t dynamics.  
Marketing Research: Researched and presented solutions for the problem of low sales volume for “DeSOM”  
 
 
ADDITIONAL EXPERIENCE  
General Secretary , Business  Management  Club  2014 – 2015  
• Conducted and promoted several university trips to Northern areas with my team of 12  members.  
Team Leader,  Polo  Club              2015 - 2016  
• I was the team leader university polo club  team.  
• Going to be a certified Customer Re lation M anager By BMW.  
 
 
HONORS, AWARDS & TRAININGS  
 
• 3rd Position representing LGU at LUMS supply chain  summit.  
•  1st position in university for finishing the fairy meadow  trek.  
•  1st position in university dramatic  competition  
•  Hands on experience on SAP for 2.5 years  
 
 
 
SKILLS & INTERESTS  
 
• Competent user of Microsoft Office, SAP & CRM  systems.  
• Vast interest in travelling, hiking and keeping pet. Pets make your surroundings relaxed.  
• I am professional horse rider and beginner level swimmer.3
input.additional_info: Innovate Connections Inc. prefers candidates from recognized universities such as the University of Management & Technology and Lahore School of Economics. We encourage a remote working environment but require physical presence for team-building and strategic sessions twice a quarter. Relocation assistance is available for exceptional candidates. Our comprehensive assessment includes a technical test followed by structured interviews to evaluate both technical and soft skills comprehensively.
minimum_requirements: Experience with business intelligence tools such as Power BI, SQL, and Tableau
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Business, or a related field
3+ years of experience in lead generation or business intelligence
